1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Bara'bin 'Azib said:"The Messenger of Allah was asked about performing ablution after eating camel meat. He said: 'Perform ablution after eating it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوُضُوءِ مِنْ لُحُومِ الإِبِلِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been narrated about ablution due to camel meat
